resources.string:
Make setup fast and easy by using your Fitbit profile! 
Just tap to enable, sign into your Fitbit account, and 
we will use the information you already provided to 
Fitbit to create your Thermos Smart Lid app profile. 

Your hydration stats will automatically be synced 
from your Thermos Smart Lid app to your Fitbit 
account each time you finish a bottle of water.

Enter your email address to receive emails containing updates, notices, and promotions about this mobile app and Thermos products. You can withdraw your consent at any time by using the unsubscribe function in each with certain third parties in line with our Privacy Policy For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy or Contact Us
Use the enclosed charger to plug your Smart Lid inot a power source, such as a computer or wall adapter. Once the lid has power, it will wake up immediately.
Your Thermos Smart Lid app profile has officially been populated with your Fitbit data. Continue through set up. Update any information you like.

Your hydration goal is set to the general baselinegoal ,which is provided for informational purposes only. Filling out a hydration profile will create a Suggested Hydration Goal catered to you and your lifestyle.
Can select a maximum of %d images
